channel.title: La Tinaja
channel.description: My name is Brian Jones. These are my notes on topics including books, publishing, tech, and history.

item.title: Recent Reading: Failure, Responsive Design, and Flavors
item.description: Notes on recent reading include failure in Silicon Valley and David Chang on flavor.

item.title: PDF Preview Problem on El Capitán
item.description: I recently had problems with PDFs opening in Preview on OS X El Capitán.

item.title: Recent Reading: Roguelikes, Runners, and Triremes
item.description: My reading the last couple of weeks has included ancient Mediterranean seafaring, early roguelikes, and Kenyan marathons.

item.title: Recent Reading: Apocryphal Geography, Maps, and JavaScript
item.description: My recent reading includes British exploration in the Pacific, scripting maps, and programming in JavaScript.

item.title: Recent Reading: Naval Architecture, Digital Locks, World of Warcraft
item.description: Things I’ve read recently include the science of shipbuilding, copyright, and raiding.

item.title: Copenhagen Psych Fest 2016
item.description: Artists performing at Copenhagen Psych Fest 2016

item.title: Alfred Workflow for Updating App Icons
item.description: Wrap a short shell script in an Alfred workflow to reset app icons rewritten on updates.

item.title: Recent Reading: Meteorology, Data Surveillance, and Twitter
Derek Yu’s Spelunky
item.description: Derek Yu’s development post-mortem on his game Spelunky provides a sensitive, insightful take on working on large, long-term projects as in individual or small team.

item.title: Catching Up with Reading Lists
item.description: Financial crises, early modern travel writing, free culture, fantasy and sci-fi, etc. all in a big catchup of cataloging my recent reading
